DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Primary : Comparison proportion patient achieve continence four arm 6 month . Secondary : - Comparison time achieve continence four arm . - Comparison urinary symptom quality life improvement four arm . - Assessment adverse event Duloxetine arm . Primary outcome/ time frame : Proportion patient achieve continence 6 month . Continence define `` use pad '' `` security pad '' . Secondary outcome : - time achieve continence - Quality life test relation incontinence accord Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) King 's Health Questionnaire ( KQH ) . - Urinary symptom measure International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) . No . subject enter : 300 patient inform include , 240 patient randomize . Statistical method - Proportion patient achieve continence time achieve continence compare four arm . - Comparison quality life outcomes four arm - Comparison clinical variable affect primary/secondary outcome - univariate multivariate analysis ( ITT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective RCT Post Prostatectomy Urine Leak
DOC.criteria: 1 . All consecutive patient undergo Robotic Assisted Radical Prostatectomy clinically organ confined prostate cancer 1 . Prior urethral , bladder prostate surgery 2 . Pelvic radiotherapy . 3 . Overactive bladder 4 . Known neurological disease associate LUTS 5 . Hepatic impairment hepatic insufficiency . 6 . Severe renal impairment ( creatinine clearance < 30ml/min ) 7 . Hypersensitivity duloxetine 8 . Uncontrolled hypertension 9 . Narrow angle glaucoma Postoperative criterion : 10 . Postvoid residual urine volume > 100ml measure 15 day RARP
